attributes.action: bring the British Troops Home immediately.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This is simply a petition to bring the british troops home that are serving and losing their lives in an area that shouldnt even be served by the british army, we should be focusing on areas such as Haiti that need our help!

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
